an3.112:4.3: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati;
an3.112:4.4: anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati;
an3.112:4.5: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:4.6: Kathañca, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:4.7: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:4.8: Tassa atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:4.10: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:4.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:5.2: Anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:5.3: Tassa anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:5.5: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:5.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati?
an3.112:6.2: Paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakketi anuvicāreti.
an3.112:6.3: Tassa paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha cetasā anuvitakkayato anuvicārayato chando jāyati.
an3.112:6.5: Etamahaṃ, bhikkhave, saṃyojanaṃ vadāmi yo cetaso sārāgo.
an3.112:6.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando jāyati.
an3.112:6.7: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṃ samudayāya.
an3.112:7.3: Atīte, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati;
an3.112:7.4: anāgate, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati;
an3.112:7.5: paccuppanne, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:8.2: Atītānaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ vipākaṃ pajānāti.
an3.112:8.4: Tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:8.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, atīte chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:9.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:9.2: Anāgatānaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ vipākaṃ pajānāti.
an3.112:9.4: Tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:9.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, anāgate chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:10.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati?
an3.112:10.2: Paccuppannānaṃ, bhikkhave, chandarāgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ āyatiṃ vipākaṃ pajānāti, āyatiṃ vipākaṃ viditvā tadabhinivatteti, tadabhinivattetvā cetasā abhinivijjhitvā paññāya ativijjha passati.
an3.112:10.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, paccuppanne chandarāgaṭṭhāniye dhamme ārabbha chando na jāyati.
an3.112:10.4: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti.
